channel.title: Homeworks on CMSC320 Introduction to Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Homeworks on CMSC320 Introduction to Data Science

item.title: Setting up R
item.description: For class we will be using R, Rstudio and git. You can download and install each using the links below. However, you can instead use Rocker, a project built on top of Docker to manage your software installation. We’ve setup a container that will provide you with a working installation of R, and the Rstudio IDE, along with a lot of packages providing analysis tools and datasets we will use throughout the semester.

item.title: Homework: Datatypes and Wrangling
item.description: In this assignment, you will explore and exercise your knowledge of data types, data operations and data plotting. Data types Choose a dataset from those linked on the class resources page or found anywhere online. The only requirement is that this dataset is downloadable as a CSV (comma separated value) file. Answer the following questions: 1) Provide a URL to the dataset. 2) Explain why you chose this dataset.
